desc: The year-round performance base layer gear sized S-XL to support your gym training, hiking, biking, & nordic-skiing. Made for men & women using merino wool & dry insulating fabrics. BRUBECK is dedicated to developing top-tier quality clothing, and technology with a commitment to sustainable practices & animal welfare.

layout.text: OUR NO-ITCH MERINO WOOL IS BODY MAPPED FOR YOUR COMFORT
